entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
